view.servlets.helpers

Class UpdateOrderList

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.servlets.helpers.UpdateOrderList

  • public class UpdateOrderList
extends java.lang.Object
    utility class for the presentation layer, the purpose of this class is to update changes to the order list for the proper user. This is a static class
